Literature.Title: Chemometrics and genome mining reveal an unprecedented family of sugar acid-containing fungal nonribosomal cyclodepsipeptides
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2022;119:e2123379119
Literature.Author: Wang C, Xiao D, Dun B, Yin M, Tsega AS, Xie L, Li W, Yue Q, Wang S, Gao H, Lin M, Zhang L, Molnár I, Xu Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Plasmodium falciparum 3D7(IC50=13.5±0.8µM),Plasmodium falciparum 3D7(IC50=20.9±0.2µM),Plasmodium falciparum 3D7(IC50=23.7±2.4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=>20µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>20µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>20µg/ml),Candida albicans SC5314(MIC=>20µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans var. grubii H99(MIC=>20µg/ml)
